nostrnip5-desc: Provides NIP-5 verification for MediaWiki users
nostrnip5-pubkey-help: Your Nostr public key. You can paste the 64-character hex pubkey (from a NIP-07 extension) or an npub1... bech32 key. This will be used for NIP-5 verification at /.well-known/nostr.json
nostrnip5-pubkey-invalid: Invalid Nostr public key format. Expected 64 hex characters or an npub1... bech32 key.
